title: Software Development Engineering Manager
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just create products — they create the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that inspires the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it. Do you have a passion helping other teams achieve great results through tools you and your team have developed and deployed? Do you enjoy working hands-on with your team to find solutions to challenging problems? Do you enjoy learning and applying new technologies to improve your customer’s success? The System Architecture & Pro Workflow teams depend on the software tools, workload automation and infrastructure support of the team in order to improve Apple products and technologies across Mac, iPhone and iPad and we are seeking a Manager for the team. Come join us!
description: We are seeking a self-motivated individual with strong technical, communication, and project management skills to handle key responsibilities including but not limited to; - Defining and delivering system architecture tools and features, resource planning and development schedules. - Defining and delivering IT services across three physical sites in the West Coast supporting two different groups. - Advise and encourage engineering best practices to deliver quality capabilities. - Define and grow a diverse and an extraordinary Engineering Team.
preferred_qualifications: Experience in development and deployment of software tools supporting internal groups. Experience with server room administration, provisioning, and service vendor management. Proficiency and passion to independently learn new technologies and SW frameworks to leverage. Experience with automation frameworks and CI/CD systems. Experience with system architecture, performance, and modeling tools. Experience leading services across multiple physical sites is a plus.
